param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date Format

param.name: ga_cache

param.description: Select whether to cache the google analytics data (this is only available in the PRO version).

param.name: ga_cache_time

param.description: jQuery is required by this component. The only reason not to load it is if it has already been loaded manually or by another module.
